songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Go 'head, O
Yeah
Danny, I see you

[Chorus]
Yeah, so long my friend (Huh, ayy, yeah, hey)
Yeah, so long my friend
One life, you can't get it back
You got one life, you can't get it back
Yeah, so long my friend
(Ayy, so long, so long)
Yeah, so long my friend
(Ah, yeah, yeah)

[Verse]
Ayy, know a nigga wanna just get back
Brand new chopper got kickback, ayy (Phew)
Poppin' these percs, no Tic-Tacs (Yeah)
Keep a stick in reach, I can't lack
We got one life, tryna make it out
And them young niggas in the drought
I wasn't playin' fair, was playin' foul (Yeah, playin' foul)
Keep my head above water, I don't want to drown (I don't want to drown)
Dead bodies in the lost and found (Ooh)
Young nigga I was goin' wild, ayy
Yeah killin', killin' out of envy, for no reason
Killed my brother, hair was blue like he from Four Seasons
When I woke up, got the news, I swear I couldn't believe it
Pushin' up, we want revenge, we don't do no grieving

[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah yeah
Got these niggas jealous, know they hate me
Gotta watch my back, streets made me, yeah
Young nigga tryna feed my babies

[Chorus]
Yeah, so long my friend (Huh, ayy, yeah, hey)
Yeah, so long my friend
One life, you can't get it back
You got one life, you can't get it back
Yeah, so long my friend
(Ayy, so long, so long)
Yeah, so long my friend
(Ah, yeah, yeah)
songs.title: So Long My Friend
